Horizontal Rule

Lists

Unordered

  • One
  • Two
    • Two.A
    • Two.B
  • Three

Ordered

  1. First
  2. Second
    1. Second.A
    2. Second.B
  3. Third

Code

Inline const x = 123;

Fenced code (JS)

function hello(name) {
  // comment
  console.log(`Hello, ${name}!`);
}
hello("Aero2");

Text ToolTips

Use text tooltips to emphasize information

TIP You can add sidebar_limit: 6 per page to show more recent posts.

INFO Inline code won’t get token colors — only fenced blocks do.

WARNING Don’t forget to close code fences, or the rest of the document becomes a code block.

DANGER Deleting _site is safe, but deleting your source files isn’t.

Math

math: true must be set in the page front matter to enable math.

Inline: $E=mc^2$

Display:

\[\int_0^\infty e^{-x^2}\,dx=\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}\]
